Name: Require the establishment of a composting program at dormitories, dining facilities, and other facilities owned, occupied, or operated. (S.5713/A.3249)
Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.5713/A.3249, to require the establishment of a composting program at dormitories, dining facilities, and other facilities owned, occupied, or operated by the State University of New York, the City University of New York, and institutions subject to their jurisdiction
BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council
This Resolution was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management
